mapper.select: WITH TMP AS ( SELECT A.SPEC_ID , A.ROLE_ID , A.FRST_NM , A.LAST_NM , A.GENDER FROM FRST.USER_INFO A WHERE A.ROLE_ID IN ('03', '02') AND A.STCD <> '02' ) SELECT DISTINCT ON (A.SPEC_ID) A.SPEC_ID AS "teacherID" , A.ROLE_ID AS "roleID" , A.FRST_NM AS "firstName" , A.LAST_NM AS "lastName" , A.GENDER AS "gender" , B.DEPT_ID AS "departmentID" , B.DEPT_ROLE_CD AS "userRoleInDpm" FROM TMP A LEFT JOIN FRST.DEPT_MNGT B ON A.SPEC_ID = B.TCH_ID AND B.STCD <> '02' WHERE ('' = COALESCE(#{teacherID}, '') OR A.SPEC_ID = #{teacherID}) AND ('' = COALESCE(#{departmentID}, '') OR B.DEPT_ID = #{departmentID}) ORDER BY A.SPEC_ID

SELECT /* RetrieveDepartmentManagementTotalCount */ COUNT(*) AS "totalCount" FROM FRST.DEPT_MNGT A JOIN FRST.DEPT_INFO B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID AND B.STCD <> '02' WHERE ('' = COALESCE(#{teacherID}, '') OR A.TCH_ID = #{teacherID}) AND ('' = COALESCE(#{departmentID}, '') OR A.DEPT_ID = #{departmentID}) AND A.STCD <> '02'

SELECT /* RetrieveDepartmentManagementDetail */ B.TCH_ID AS "teacherID" , A.DEPT_ID AS "departmentID" , A.DEPT_NM AS "departmentName" , A.DEPT_DESC AS "departmentDesc" , B.STCD AS "statusCode" FROM FRST.DEPT_INFO A JOIN FRST.DEPT_MNGT B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID WHERE A.DEPT_ID = #{departmentID} AND ('' = COALESCE(#{teacherID}, '') OR B.TCH_ID = #{teacherID}) AND ('' = COALESCE(#{departmentRoleCode}, '') OR B.DEPT_ROLE_CD = #{departmentRoleCode}) AND A.STCD <> '02' LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT /* RegisterDepartmentManagement */ INTO FRST.DEPT_MNGT ( TCH_ID , DEPT_ID , DEPT_ROLE_CD , STCD , FRST_REG_DT , FRST_REG_TIME , LAST_CHNG_DT , LAST_CHNG_TIME) VALUES ( #{teacherID} , #{departmentID} , COALESCE(#{departmentRoleCode}, '') , COALESCE(#{statusCode}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterTime}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, ''))
mapper.update: UPDATE /* UpdateDepartmentManagement */ FRST.DEPT_MNGT SET TCH_ID = COALESCE(#{teacherID}, TCH_ID) , STCD = COALESCE(#{statusCode}, STCD) , DEPT_ROLE_CD = COALESCE(#{departmentRoleCode}, DEPT_ROLE_CD) , LAST_CHNG_DT = COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, LAST_CHNG_DT) , LAST_CHNG_TIME = COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, LAST_CHNG_TIME) WHERE DEPT_ID = #{departmentID} AND TCH_ID = #{teacherID}
